intro: Gundelia dersim, commonly known as the Armenian coffee plant, is a flowering plant native to the high-altitude regions of the Eastern Mediterranean and the Caucasus. Gundelia dersim is also noted for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional medicine for various ailments.
